article.title: Lockheed Martin Awarded Apache Performance-Based Logistics Follow-On Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Army has awarded Lockheed Martin a follow-on contract to support the Target Acquisition Designation Sight/Pilot Night Vision Sensor (TADS/PNVS) and Modernized TADS/PNVS (M-TADS/PNVS) systems on the AH-64 Apache helicopter. The contract has a potential value of $89 million for 2009.
